extDescription.message: Your AI-powered solution for smarter studying.

alert_zoom.message: Set your zoom level to 100% to use QuickSnap.

alert_something_wrong.message: An error occurred. Please try again.

alert_screen_text_empty.message: The selected area is empty. Please try again.

alert_no_answer.message: No answers available for this question.

alert_no_text_selected.message: No text selected. Highlight text to proceed.

alert_no_text_selected_prompt.message: Select text to get the answer.

alert_no_text_selected_prompt_screen.message: Drag and select an area to analyze.

alert_no_text_selected_prompt_screen_zoo.message: Adjust your zoom to 100% for better analysis.

copy_the_answer.message: Copy this answer to your clipboard.

sorry_no_answer.message: Sorry, no answers found for this question.

error_login.message: Not logged in. Please connect your account.

error_cannot_read_image.message: Could not process the image. Try again.

subscribe_for_more.message: Subscribe to unlock more answers and features.

turn_on_the_extension.message: Activate the extension to analyze page content.

auto_detect_description.message: Automatically identify and analyze quiz questions.

precision_highlight_description.message: Highlight text to get precise answers instantly.

quick_snap_description.message: QuickSnap Feature: Encircle and analyze quiz questions easily.

quick_snap_language_description.message: Choose your preferred language for QuickSnap.

show_question_in_modal_description.message: Review Question in Modal: Shows the captured question in the modal above QuizSolver's answer for easy cross-referencing.

enable_quizsolver_description.message: Enable QuizSolver: Turn on QuizSolver to start using the extension.

multiple_choice_help.message: Easily find the right answers for multiple-choice quizzes.

text_explanation_help.message: Clarify and understand complex text sections.

long_problems.message: Not suitable for lengthy problems over 150 words.

highly_effective_tool.message: Perfect for areas with non-selectable text.

historyDescription.message: View up to 30 of your past requests.

errorTryAgainLater.message: An error occurred. Try again later.

loginToGetHistory.message: Log in to view your history.

default_request_description.message: Choose the default request type for the extension.

error_extension_not_active.message: QuizSolver is not active. Enable it in settings.

error_quicksnap_not_enabled.message: QuickSnap Mode is not enabled. Enable it in settings.

error_smart_highlight_not_enabled.message: Smart Highlight is not enabled. Enable it in settings.

error_no_text_selected.message: Please select the text to use the Smart Highlight feature.

error_try_again.message: An error occurred. Please try again.

quick_snap_mode_description.message: Drag and drop to encircle the quiz question and answers for quick analysis.

language_description.message: Choose your preferred language for QuizSolver.

ghost_mode_description.message: Make the extension invisible for discreet use.

notifications_description.message: Receive updates and feature notifications directly in your browser.

image_solver_description.message: Extract text from images and get instant answers.

popup_settings_description.message: Configure how the popup behaves and displays information.

custom_style_description.message: Customize the appearance of the popup, including background, text color, and opacity.

request_types_description.message: Choose the type of request you want the extension to handle, such as solving problems, translate, analyzing questions, etc...
